body:
[3% completed]
LOGO:

Hey! I am doing an anti-lag texture pack 4x4.... The beta version is coming!
Based in SimpleCraft
I had every time (in Avicus) with OCD resources pack 50-60 fps
and now, I have using X4DoCraft and my fps are 110-130 fps!!!
It duplicate my fps!
HERE IS A SCREENSHOT WITH SOME BLOCK TEXTURES:

blocks in the screenshot: wool, wood, clay, cobblestone, grass, wood plancs, polished stonebrick, stonebrick, dirt, dirt and stone.
This project is no finished! But I am doing [only me, at the moment] more textures and it will be released in no time!
:D Please leave your opinion in your comments
But if you can't wait for free-lag experience, download now an Alpha version! (in the following mediafire downloads)

downloads:

Alpha:
v0.0.1:  https://www.mediafire.com/?sho4g4kl9occ7ow -size: 1.04 MB 

ANY BUG OR ERROR CONTACT ME, Thank you!

*If you want help with some textures like blocks and water contact me on Skype!

title: X4DoCraft [resourcespack]

replies.body: The textures like grass, stone, dirt, bedrock, etc. are finished... If you want, I can give you a no finished demo, based in SimpleCraft

replies.body: Okay tomorrow or later I will give you the demo because we are working on it, and the textures are limited. And please be sure to check tomorrow this post to download the demo!

replies.body:
-UPDATED-
Alpha version released (0.0.1) and 3% completed! 
It is the first official version (Alpha) enjoy it!
Updates:
Added cobblestone and stonebrick textures.
updated grass and dirt.
__________________________________________________________________
I will fix some errors produced in mediafire and delete old folders.
ACTUALLY, THE LAST VERSION IS 1.04 MB
